message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Bob, I understand that you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go back to the original $850000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $875000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a good deal, so I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Bob, I understand that you're willing to walk away if you don't get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go back to the original $850000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $880000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $880000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $880000 and $850000, so I'll offer $865000. That's my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept it.

Bob, I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $865000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $890000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?
